name: 鬥犬 Dog Fighting
description:
Lazy Pack: turn-based management, automatic battle, no-operation game

  • Game Features

Dog Fighting is a non-operational game with dogs as the protagonist, management training, nurturing offspring, and automatic battles.
Players manage and manage their own dogs, train and participate in competitions, get bonuses, and then breed stronger offspring.

9 inherent breeds with breed skills and different qualities
Mix, no breed skills, but can breed new breeds

Competition battle mode, automatic battle, the higher the level, the more bonuses you get
Fix the competition schedule, arrange the itinerary, train, adjust, rest, and win the highest honor

Breed offspring, breed to get powerful offspring, to win the game

Various skills, up to 50 kinds of skills, each with a variety of skills and skills that can be learned
Win the championship easily
